amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the appropriation for the National Endowment for the Humanities funding by $12.9 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the bill's $92 million funding by $12 million (13%) for grants and administration of the National Endowment for the Humanities and to require at that at least $28,000,000 be use for state grants.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shadegg amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 168 - 254 (Roll no. 261).
